import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { getQuestions } from './../Service/QuizApi' import '../App.css' const Header = () => { const [difficultyLevel, setDifficultyLevel] = useState('') const [totalQuestions, setTotalQuestions] = useState(0) let handleQuestions = (e: any) => { setTotalQuestions(e.target.value) } let handleDifficulty = (e: any) => { setDifficultyLevel(e.target.value) } useEffect(() => { getQuestions(totalQuestions, difficultyLevel); }, []) return (
